rukus.text: 70|36|Kaphiradera hala ki ye, tara apanara dike chute asache
70|37|dana o bama dika theke, dale dale.
70|38|Tadera pratyeke ki e pratyasa kare ye, take prabesa karano habe pracuryamaya jannate
70|39|kakhano naya [1], amara taderake ya theke srsti karechi ta tara jane [2].
70|40|Ata'eba, ami sapatha karachi udayacalasamuha ebam astacalasamuhera rabera â€“ abasya'i amara saksama [1]
70|41|tadera ceye utkrstaderake tadera sthalabarti karate ebam ete amara aksama na'i.
70|42|Ata'eba taderake baka-bitanda o khela-tamasaya matta thakate dinaâ€“ ye dinera pratisruti taderake deya haya tara sam'mukhina ha'oyara aga paryanta.
70|43|Sedina tara kabara theke bera habe drutabege, mane habe tara kono laksyasthalera dike dhabita hacche
70|44|abanata netre; hinata taderake acchanna karabe; eta'i se dina, yara bisaye satarka kara hayechila taderake.
